track.name: Lying from You
comments: The very worst part of you is me!
I wanna be pushed aside so let me gooooooooo
this is just one of those albums you hear one song, and you gotta go back and listen to the entire 36 minute album
wow I miss these guys....can't get enough of this album right now!!!

"This song is just great in every way, but then again, isn't Linkin Park always awesome?"

No, actually, they aren't. Their first two albums, which includes this fantastic track, were awesome.  Their entire subsequent discography after their first two albums are absolute sewage and were the biggest finger to its fanbase a band could give.
the very worst part of you is me
the background sample is so goood
probably my favorite linkin park song. really like the chorus
also sampled by the British comedian Bill Bailey

On a lot of comments people (including myself) quote one of their favorite lines of the song. In this particular song I would have to type the entire song. This song is just great in every way, but then again, isn't Linkin Park always awesome?
